segments.text: Did you put this morning's faxes on my desk ? I'm waiting for some urgent faxes from headquarters , I'm pretty sure they came in last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything that came in off the fax machine last night is all on your desk . But I noticed that some of the faxes came through pretty blurred . Maybe you can take a look at them . If the copy is unreadable , I'll call them and ask them to relax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you're going to have to call them and get them to be re-faxed . These copies are so dark , I can't make out any of the words .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one ? This one is so light I can barely read it . How can that be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , I think the fax machine is out of toner , I can change the toner cartridge . That should solve the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but this one will have to be re-faxed as well . And look , there's about three pages missing ! It looks loke the fax machine ate half my important faxes , and the ones that made it through are so blurred or too light , they're unreadable !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess the fax machine is out of paper , too . Don't worry , I'll have someone look at it this afternoon , and in the meantime , I'll have your documents re-faxed to our other fax machine .
segments.speaker: S2
